room_title: Escape room "Wolf-En-Stein" by MindBreak in St. Louis
room_description: Our scientists loves his dog - his friend and only companion is getting older. He creates a canine youth serum so he can turn his friend back into the cute puppy he was for many more years of companionship - Oh No something must have happened! You and your friends are called in to somehow correct the formula - change the now Wolf back into the playful puppy and friend! Please hurry before itâ€™s to late. All video and pictures of dogs in this room are from the Five Acres animal shelter.
